text: Futhi labo ababefisa isikhundla sakhe ngayizolo baqala bathi, â€œOh ngempela! NguMvelinqangi owandisa isabelo kunoma ngabe ngubani amthandayo ezincekwini zakhe noma asinciphise (isabelo), ukube uMvelinqangi wayengenawo umusa kuthina wayezokwenza ukuthi umhlaba usigwinye, Oh labo abangakholwa! angeke baphunyeleliswe
